text: George Henry Morling (21 Nov 1891 – 8 April 1974) was Principal of the NSW Baptist College from 1921 to 1960. Morling also served as President General of the Baptist Union of Australia from 1962 to 1964. Rowland Croucher has described Morling as one of the four most admired Australian Baptists, alongside Geoffrey Blackburn, F. W. Boreham, and Noel Vose.Rowland Croucher, "Review: Geoffrey Blackburn, Beyond Imagining" In 1985, the NSW Baptist College was renamed Morling College in his honour. == References == Category:Australian Baptist ministers Category:1891 births Category:1974 deaths Category:Seminary presidents Category:University of Sydney alumni
title: George Morling
